description: The host_data method is designed to report the current capabilities of a host to help determine its suitability for scheduling new instances. The recent change that allowed an admin to disable a host from accepting new instances should have included adding that status to the info returned by host_data.
title: Xenhost plugin does not include enabled status with its host_data
